cause.description:
We believe that since Chip is already omniscient it would be in the interest of the greater good to make him omnipotent.
It would be greatly appreciated if you would like to make any contributions or changes to the Description and Positions. Ben wrote them at 2 AM.
1. Chip > Chuck Norris.
cause.mission: To democratically elect Chip, burn down Capitol Hill, and swear him in as Führer.
cause.name: Chip Beall for Führer
